trans-unit.source: Defines how the certificate key can be used.
If this value is not defined, the key can be used for any purpose.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne verdien ikke er definert, kan nøkkelen brukes til formål.

trans-unit.source: This class is an implementation of a commonly used extension that is mapped by default to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig> file.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er en implementering av en brukte filtype som er tilordnet som standard til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>filen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> class is invoked, this class can be used directly.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A>for den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>klassen aktiveres, denne klassen kan brukes direkte.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key can be used to sign a certificate revocation list (CRL).
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen kan brukes til å signere sertifikatopphevelseslisten (CRL).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The key can be used for data encryption.
To be added.
The key can be used for decryption only.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen kan brukes for bare dekryptering.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The key can be used as a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen kan brukes som en digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The key can be used for encryption only.
To be added.
The key can be used to determine key agreement, such as a key created using the Diffie-Hellman key agreement algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen kan brukes til å fastsette key avtalen, for eksempel en nøkkel som er opprettet med algoritmen Diffie-Hellman key avtalen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The key can be used to sign certificates.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen kan brukes til å signere sertifikater.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
The key can be used for key encryption.
To be added.
No key usage parameters.
To be added.
The key can be used for authentication.
To be added.
